pac_calculations.description: Calculated PAC results (optional - can be computed on-demand)

month_locks.description: Month locking system to prevent data modifications

fields.is_locked: boolean - whether the month is currently locked
fields.locked_by: string - email of user who locked the month
fields.locked_at: timestamp - when the month was locked
fields.locked_by_role: string - role of user who locked the month
fields.unlocked_by: string - email of user who unlocked the month (if applicable)
fields.unlocked_at: timestamp - when the month was unlocked (if applicable)
fields.unlocked_by_role: string - role of user who unlocked the month (if applicable)
fields.lock_history: array - complete audit trail of lock/unlock actions
